text: Jason Quang-Vinh Pendant (born 9 February 1997) is a French professional footballer who plays as defender for New York Red Bulls in MLS. ==Club career== ===Sochaux=== Born in Sarcelles, France, Pendant began his youth career with hometown club Sarcelles AAS before joining Sochaux. After playing in seven matches for the first team during the 2016–17 Ligue 2 season; Pendant signed his first professional contact with the club on 20 June 2017. He scored his first professional goal on 23 January 2018 in a 2–1 victory against Colomiers in the Coupe de France. ===New York Red Bulls=== On 10 March 2020, Pendant completed a transfer to MLS club, New York Red Bulls. ==International career== Pendant was born in France to a French father and a Vietnamese mother, making him eligible for both national teams. He was a youth international player for France.
